news.title: Why don’t we have flying cars? | John Preston and Ben Waterson
news.summary: Flying cars in The Jetsons and Back to the Future, or Star Trek’s spaceships and teleportation, may have captured the imagination decades ago, but most current methods of transport have been around a long time.
